short_summary: Diesel Fuel, Automotive Gasoline, and Heating Fuel Oil
description: supply of diesel fuel, automotive gasoline, and heating fuel oil in Canada
full_summary:
====================================

**National Master Standing Offers for Diesel Fuel, Automotive Gasoline, and Heating Fuel Oil**

**Reference Number:** WS4006758308-Doc4006944752 (Revision 3)
**Publication Date:** May 12, 2023
**Closing Date for Tenders:** July 19, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is hereby inviting qualified suppliers to submit quotations for a National Master Standing Offers (NMSO) contract for Diesel Fuel, Automotive Gasoline, and Heating Fuel Oil in accordance with Canadian General Standards Board standards, as applicable. Deliveries are to be made to various locations in Canada on an as-and-when-requested basis from September 1, 2023, to August 31, 2025.

This procurement is subject to various land claims agreements, including the Inuvialuit Final Agreement, Gwich'in Comprehensive Land Claims Agreement, Tlicho Land Claims Agreement, and others. Full details of the requirements can be found in Appendix F.

**Delivery Locations:**

Diesel Fuel, Automotive Gasoline, and Heating Fuel Oil are to be delivered to various locations in Canada, including Saskatchewan, Yukon, National Capital Region, British Columbia, Prince Edward Island, Ontario, Nova Scotia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Quebec, Alberta, Newfoundland and Labrador, and Indigenous Lands.

**Procurement Method:**

This is a competitive procurement process, with bids to be submitted in writing. Documents may be submitted in either English or French.

**Selection Criteria:**

Bids will be evaluated on the basis of price. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Additional Information:**

Debriefings will be available upon request.

**Contact Information:**

For further information, please contact Ann Lacelle, PSPC/TPSGC, at ann.lacelle@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

Note: the rewritten entry has been formatted into clear sections with headings to facilitate easier reading.
